sect2.title: Image Window Snapping Behavior
sect2.para: This page allows you to customize snapping in the image. Only Snap to Guides is activated by default. You can also check Snap to Grid, Snap to Canvas Edges and Snap to Active Path, in normal mode and fullscreen mode.
Snapping distance is the activation distance of snapping, in pixels. Default value is 8 pixels (1-255).
